alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 3:12PM EST until December 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of around an inch. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially untreated bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of snow is expected to taper off through this evening, with the highest snow totals at elevations above 1200 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
